# YAML data instructions

## Do not churn data files
- Avoid global reformatting (spacing, key ordering, quoting) unless requested.
- Touch only the files required for the task.

## Schema discipline
- Follow the schema documented in each folder’s README.
- If you add a new field, prefer optional fields and keep defaults consistent.

## Licensing / content safety
- Do not introduce copyrighted non-SRD text/content.
- Keep additions consistent with the project’s existing compliance approach.
